import React from "react";
import { cx } from "emotion";
import PropTypes from "../utils/prop-types-extra";
import mergeProps from "../utils/merge-props";
 
import Icon from "./icon";
 
import getLabelStyle from "../styles/label/label.style";
import getLabelIconStyle from "../styles/label/label-icon.style";
 
export function Label({
  absolute,
  active,
  attached,
  basic,
  bottom,
  children,
  circular,
  component,
  corner,
  disabled,
  icon,
  left,
  pointing,
  ribbon,
  right,
  size,
  tag,
  top,
  variation,
  className,
  ...otherProps
}) {
 
  let iconElement;
 
  const styleFlags = {
    absolute,
    active,
    attached,
    basic,
    bottom,
    circular,
    corner,
    icon: !!icon,
    left,
    pointing: !!pointing,
    pointingDown: pointing === "down" || pointing === "below",
    pointingLeft: pointing === "left",
    pointingRight: pointing === "right",
    pointingUp: pointing === "up" || pointing === true || pointing === "above",
    ribbon,
    right,
    tag,
    top,
  };
 
  if (icon) {
    iconElement = (
      <i key="icon" className={cx("icon",getLabelIconStyle(styleFlags))} aria-hidden="true">
        <Icon icon={icon} />
      </i>
    );
  }
 
  const newProps = mergeProps({
    className: cx("cm-label",getLabelStyle(styleFlags,variation,size),className),
  },otherProps);
 
  return React.createElement(component,newProps,[iconElement,children]);
 
}
 
Label.isLabel = true;
 
Label.propTypes = {
  absolute: PropTypes.bool,
  active: PropTypes.bool,
  attached: PropTypes.bool,
  basic: PropTypes.bool,
  bottom: PropTypes.bool,
  children: PropTypes.any,
  circular: PropTypes.bool,
  component: PropTypes.any,
  corner: PropTypes.bool,
  detail: PropTypes.any,
  disabled: PropTypes.bool,
  icon: PropTypes.any,
  left: PropTypes.bool,
  pointing: PropTypes.string,
  ribbon: PropTypes.bool,
  right: PropTypes.bool,
  size: PropTypes.oneOf(["mini","tiny","small","medium","big","large","huge","massive"]),
  tag: PropTypes.bool,
  top: PropTypes.bool,
  variation: PropTypes.variation,
  className: PropTypes.string,
};
 
Label.defaultProps = {
  component: "div"
};
 
 
export function CornerLabel(props) {
  return <Label corner {...props} />;
}
CornerLabel.isLabel = true;
CornerLabel.isCorner = true;
 
 
export function AttachedLabel(props) {
  return <Label attached {...props} />;
}
AttachedLabel.isLabel = true;
AttachedLabel.isAttached = true;
 
 
export function Tag(props) {
  return <Label tag {...props} />;
}
Tag.isLabel = true;
Tag.isTag = true;
 
 
export function Ribbon(props) {
  return <Label ribbon {...props} />;
}
Ribbon.isLabel = true;
Ribbon.isRibbon = true;
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Sun Jan 27 2019 21:16:38 GMT+0000 (GMT)
